attributes.action: Declare ISIS a Terrorist Organisation to protect the people of the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned declare that the Government of the UK declare ISIS as a terrorist organisation and arrest those who distribute any promotional literature on behalf of the organisation to protect the British public and the radicalisation of British Muslims.with prosecution for Inciting Racial Hatred and Terrorism charges.
We the undersigned also call for any returning British ISIS fighters from Syria, Iraq, Egypt and Nigeria to be arrested on terrorism charges Immediately upon return to the UK and be detained for the safety of UK citizens and where applicable, deported.
